org.araneaframework.uilib.form
Class Data

java.lang.Object
  org.araneaframework.uilib.form.Data
All Implemented Interfaces:
FormElementAware, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BigDecimalData, BigDecimalListData, BooleanData, BooleanListData, DateData, DisplayItemListData, FileInfoData, IntegerData, IntegerListData, LongData, LongListData, StringData, StringListData, TimestampData, YNData
public class Data
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, FormElementAware

This class represents typed form element data. Type is used by the ConverterFactory to find the appropriate Converter for converting Data held in FormElement to plain object type held in Control. Reverse converting happens much the same, both object type in Control and supposed FormElement Data are considered and appropriate Converter chosen.

Author:
Jevgeni Kabanov (ekabanov at araneaframework dot org)
See Also:
Serialized Form
